name: Peryton
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Dive Attack.
descriptions: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 (2d8) damage to the target.

special_abilities.name: Flyby.
descriptions: The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell.
descriptions: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The peryton makes one gore attack and one talon attack.

actions.name: Gore.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.
